title: Public Impact Apps of OR
description: The focus is on the health and public applications of Operations Research.  Students will complete a group project with a non-profit organization and discuss papers.

prerequisites: ISYE 6650 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and ISYE 6669 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
